examples.choctaw: Iski̱fa ma̱ ish i̱shikmat kata̱lichih ósh íshiho.
examples.english: When you hold that ax, make sure you hold it tight.

examples.choctaw: Alla nakni osi mat ibbakoshi okhissa kata̱lichih.
examples.english: The little boy got his finger stuck in the screen door.

examples.choctaw: Chi̱ shilosh kata̱lichit takchih, hitokma̱ iksho̱fokahi̱lah
examples.english: Tie your shoes tightly so that they don’t come loose.
